instanceVariables.name: VersusAlignmentId
instanceVariables.desc: This Fighter's alignment in the versus.

instanceVariables.name: EnergyRestorePoints
instanceVariables.desc: How many Energy points will be increased every quarter of a second.

instanceVariables.name: EnergyPointsThrust
instanceVariables.desc: How many energy points will be used for every thrusting.

instanceVariables.name: EnergyPointsShoot
instanceVariables.desc: How many energy points will be used for every shooting.

instanceVariables.name: EnergyPointsRaiseShield
instanceVariables.desc: How many energy points will be used for every shield rasing.

instanceVariables.name: ShootQuarterSeconds
instanceVariables.desc: How many quater of a second should be waited before shooting next Projectile.

instanceVariables.name: ShootCountDown
instanceVariables.desc: 0 means shooting is cool down complete.

instanceVariables.name: RaiseShieldQuarterSeconds
instanceVariables.desc: How many quarter of a second should be waited before raising next Shield.

instanceVariables.name: RaiseShieldCountDown
instanceVariables.desc: 0 means raising shield is cool down complete.

instanceVariables.name: Acceleration
instanceVariables.desc: The acceleration when applying force for thrusting.

instanceVariables.name: private_Force
instanceVariables.desc: Mass * Acceleration ( * GameToPhysicsRatio ). Not changed even if Mass changed.
